content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Ore Mine at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(-46.0, 71.0)

### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(16.0, 71.0)

### Iron Plate Smelter at position(-45.0, 0.0)
Consists of a Stone Furnace at position(-45.0, 0.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to inspect non-existent entities
- Verify that the entity exists before attempting to inspect its inventory.

### Errors when placing entities without having the required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when crafting items without the required sub-ingredients or machines
- Check that you have the required sub-ingredients and machines before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in your code.

### Errors when attempting to retrieve non-existent entities at a specific position
- Verify that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that are not ready or do not contain the item
- Ensure that the entity contains the item and is in a state ready for extraction before attempting to extract.

### Errors when inserting items into entities without having the required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

## NAMESPACE
### Important Variables
- `copper_ore_pos`: Position of the copper ore (type: Position)
- `iron_ore_pos`: Position of the iron ore (type: Position)
- `drill`: Burner Mining Drill entity (type: BurnerMiningDrill)
- `iron_drill`: Burner Mining Drill entity for iron ore (type: BurnerMiningDrill)

### Utility Functions
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
